reactor.io.net.tcp

Class TcpClient<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.io.net.ReactorPeer<IN,OUT,CONN>
      • reactor.io.net.ReactorClient<IN,OUT,ChannelStream<IN,OUT>>
        • reactor.io.net.tcp.TcpClient<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type that will be received by this client
    OUT - The type that will be sent by this client
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyTcpClient, ZeroMQTcpClient

    public abstract class TcpClient<IN,OUT>
extends ReactorClient<IN,OUT,ChannelStream<IN,OUT>>
    The base class for a Reactor-based TCP client.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini
